The Order of the A-lliance is Requesting Your Aid, Champion!

Heed our call to arms, and join our ranks in our last stand against those who threaten life on Earth!

A-lliance Space Quest

In a distant galaxy, where stars scattered like diamonds in the cosmic sea, an ancient force known as the A-lliance emerged. The Just Order of the A-lliance, a coalition of noble knights, Eagle-Bearers, and wise sages, united to forge a legacy of justice across the cosmos (including Elevation, hopefully).
As you step into the shoes of a novice knight, the universe unfolds before you like an ancient tapestry. From the radiant core worlds to the mysterious outer rims, you will traverse uncharted territories, time defining entities, and face formidable adversaries.
